name: LifeStraw 2-Stage Replacement Filter
description: Replace the filter in your LifeStraw Go or Universal bottles. A combination a membrane filter and an activated carbon filter produces safe and tasty water.Membrane microfilter treats up to 4000L (varies with water quality).Activated carbon filter treats up to 100L.Removes up to 99.99999% of waterborne bacteria, and up to 99.999% of waterborne parasites and microplastics.Compatible with LifeStraw Go and Universal bottles.LifeStraw’s Follow the Liters program provides a child in a developing country safe with drinking water for an entire school year with every LifeStraw product sold.
